value:
Heroes from both past and present...
This is the perfect place for me to
test my mettle. You can do this, Jill!

Captain Haar! Are you here?
...Captain HAARRR!

It is a knight's duty to obey the
king and fight. Orders cannot be
questioned. Or so I thought...

I fight for my father, for Talrega,
and for all of Daein. Tell me...
Who do you fight for?

Captain Haar, I... Oh, forgive
me! I mistook you for another.

You're $Nu?
I bring greetings
from $Nf.

I fight for those I wish to protect.
I fight for what I believe in!

I will not run... I will not hide...
But most of all, I will not lose!

I am the proud daughter of Shiharam
Fizzart. I will not let a small setback
like this discourage me!

This is for me? Oh, thank you. Um,
you'll forgive me if I have nothing to
give in return...

I am Jill Fizzart, wyvern rider of
Daein, attached to Captain Haar's
battalion. Um...where are we?

Do you remember when I told you
that I was born and raised in a
kingdom called Daein?$k$pCorruption in his own land motivated
my father, Shiharam Fizzart, to leave
that home behind and serve Daein.$k$pHe is worthy of such respect that
not even Captain Haar would dream
of dozing off in his presence.$k$pHe is truly the epitome of a wyvern
knight, and I respect him and his
decisions more than anyone.$k$pEven so, my time away from Daein
has shown me that my father and
I are destined to walk different paths.$k$pLittle by little, I want to build up
the confidence to hold my head
high like him—and like you!
せいっ
でやあっ！
もうっ…
お前なんかに…
Glorious battle awaits!
There is no escape!
You shall be purged!
I will never forgive you!
Father...
Heehee.
I am Jill Fizzart, daughter of Lord Shiharam of the Talrega region of Daein!
Who are you? What are your intentions?

I need to see things for myself to truly understand them.
I can't let my beliefs be shaped by the opinions of others.
My father was...a very special person. Not just to me, but Haar as well.
When I'm with Mist, all of my worries seem to fade away...

The decisions I made may have turned my own father against me, but...
They were decisions I had to make for myself.

I've come to know a new world full of new people, and it's all thanks to you.
You have my gratitude.
Readied!
Yes?
Deployed!
